item.title: 4. Applications in epidemiology
item.description:
A set of examples of rgee for the extraction and processing of remote sensing data applied to epidemiological studies is shown in the following table of contents.

Table of contents :

  1. Zonal statistics with continuous data

  2. Extraction of a large time series of meteorological variables

  3. Zonal statistics with discrete data

  4. An environmental index with a Principal Component Analysis
